name: Poppy's MyPlate Adventure
description:
Welcome to Poppy's MyPlate Adventure!

Help Poppy collect whole grain coins to defeat the racoon king and his squirrel minions! See how many different grain foods you can identify along the way while avoiding the squirrels.

Grains help Poppy Go!

*Best played on Firefox browser* 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Learn more about the MyPlate!

https://huskysport.uconn.edu

https://www.snap4ct.org
